name: 204863-A P.T. Silent Hills Demake for the GameBoy
name_original: 204863-A P.T. Silent Hills Demake for the GameBoy
description:
Controls-GB (PC)D-Pad (Arrow Keys on Keyboard)Move A (Z on Keyboard)Interact with objects
B (X on Keyboard)ReturnStart (Enter on Keyboard)Hint Menu

Warning! NOT INTENDED FOR THOSE UNDER 17 YEARS OLD! Discussions of violence and murder!

P.T./Silent Hills is quite possibly the most anticipated, controversial, and discussed games ever made. Like many others, I was heartbroken to hear that the game was cancelled, and that Hideo Kojima had left Konami. This is an homage to that great playable teaser in the style of the GameBoy Color. 

Made with GB Studio 3 and with the help of many of the great community members of the GBS Discord channel.

This is an early version of the game and I hope to add some SFX in soon.
